The Byron High School Greenhouse plants are ready! The sale will be held for one day on Saturday, May 9th, from 9 am - 2 pm. Due to public health restrictions, our greenhouse sale will be run a little differently this year. Our goal is safety while providing beautiful flowers, hanging baskets, vegetables, and herbs. All plants will be moved out of the greenhouse and placed on the lawn next to the high school. This will allow for the social distancing of all our patrons. While prices will be posted as in years past. We ask that you pay what you can in donation to our program. We will be unable to make change as we will be asking you to put your cash or check into a locked payment/donation dropbox.

The Byron High School Greenhouse is located on the north side of the high school. We encourage individuals to practice all safety measures that have been recommended by the CDC. If you have containers to help transport your plants, please bring along. If the weather does not cooperate, we will schedule a make-up day.
